intro: Lepyrodia flexuosa, commonly known as the silverleaf daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its silver-gray foliage and bright yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens. Its ornamental value is enhanced by its drought tolerance and ability to attract pollinators.
